mapper.select: SELECT food_id as foodId, food_name as foodName, food_type as foodType, food_taste as foodTaste, food_date as foodDate FROM food WHERE food_date = #{foodDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food (food_name, food_type, food_taste, food_date) VALUES (#{foodName}, #{foodType}, #{foodTaste}, #{foodDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE food SET food_name = #{foodName}, food_type = #{foodType}, food_taste = #{foodTaste}, food_date = #{foodDate} WHERE food_id = #{foodId}
